issue.title: [CF 958] Unit Level conditional doesn't report value
issue.body:
Set a condition for an icon for "Unit Level" and "player."  The value shows "Boss" when the slider is far left, but no value is shown any other location on the slider which makes it rough to dial in a specific level.

I'm including screenshots to show you exactly the result.  These are 7.0.1 Tellmewhen.

This shows the value as "Boss" like what I expect the behavior to do:
http://imgur.com/jSxukqT

This shows a blank value when moved off the far left of the slider:
http://imgur.com/FVz9mls


> Posted by CurseForge user John454ss | Imported from CurseForge issue #958 | Raw

comments.body:
Edited because the link wasn't the correct copy/paste box.  Oops.


> Posted by CurseForge user John454ss

Sorry about that. Fixed in g2358b3d.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
